title: Phyto-ecological studies and distribution patterns of subfamily Polygonoideae in relation to edaphic factors across diverse ecological zones
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Syed Waseem Gillani, Mushtaq Ahmad, M. Ajmal Ali, Muhammad Zafar, Jawaher Alkahtani, Trobjon Makhkamov, Akramjon Yuldashev, Oybek Mamarakhimov, Khislat Khaydarov, Laziza Botirova, Omer Kilic, Hamayun Shaheen, Muhammad Idrees, Shazia Sultana, Muhammad Manzoor, Salman Majeed
